ygData.subject: Re: To Nic
ygData.msgSnippet: hiya wilson.... or Yutaka... how often i frequent japan? errr... im actually now working in Japan... fer some training... will only be back next year... so i
ygData.messageBody:
hiya wilson.... or Yutaka...
how often i frequent japan? errr... im actually now working in Japan... fer
some training... will only be back next year... so i guess i wont be playing
much until i get home (i mean singaproe here)... and then i still need to
scout fer a new pc...

yes! i agree that the local folks r very helpful... everytime i "page" for
some help... requesting gp n pps... i alwiz get em.... or least someone will
response... :) thanks again guys...

i suppose its not easy to raise a char to high level... as i can imagine
levelling is exponential... :( in terms of difficulty... anyway... i will
concentrate on one char... fer now at least....

Nic
p/s: how much u all like monk so much ? any special reasons?
----- Original Message -----
From: Wilson <ritzbits@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 08, 1999 5:03 PM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] To Nic


> From: "Wilson" <ritzbits@...>
>
> Wow, same here. I only hit EQ on Friday for awhile. But don't worry Nic,
> this Singapore lot is one damn supportive bunch. They will always be
helpful
> ;-) ... I hope...
>
> After Os still have to work, so no time for homepage creating I guess.
BTW,
> how often do you frequent to Japan?
>
> Yutaka De'CheeHong <Sorry, had to give credit to LKW>
> 13th Monk for the past 3 weeks liaw...
>
> ----- Original Message -----

since
